alert.note: Alert for Brown (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:59PM CDT until July 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BROWN COUNTY... At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Willis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 953 PM, a personal weather station reported a 71 mph wind gust 1 mile east of Powhattan. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Horton, Everest, Fairview, Powhattan, Willis and Kickapoo Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
